Report.Name: FISMA AC-2: Computers added to domain
Report.Description: Captures computers added to a domain

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_24
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-645","Win-Security-4741")

Report.Name: FISMA AC-2: Computers deleted from domain
Report.Description: Captures computers removed from a domain

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_25
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-647","Win-Security-4743")

Report.Name: FISMA AC-2: Domain user accounts created
Report.Description: Captures user accounts added to a domain

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_26
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-624","Win-Security-4720")

Report.Name: FISMA AC-2: Domain user accounts deleted
Report.Description: Captures user accounts removed from a domain

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_27
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-630","Win-Security-4726")

Report.Name: FISMA AC-2: Domain user accounts modified
Report.Description: Captures domain user account modifications.

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_28
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_GroupChanged,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AccountChanged)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-2: Domain groups created
Report.Description: Captures domain group creations

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_29
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-631","Win-Security-658", "Win-Security-653", "Win-Security-663","Win-Security-4727","Win-Security-4749", "Win-Security-4754", "Win-Security-4759" )

Report.Name: FISMA AC-2: Domain groups deleted
Report.Description: Captures domain group deletions

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_30
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-634","Win-Security-662", "Win-Security-657", "Win-Security-667","Win-Security-4730","Win-Security-4753", "Win-Security-4758", "Win-Security-4763" )

Report.Name: FISMA AC-2: Domain groups modified
Report.Description: Captures domain group modifications

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_31
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-641","Win-Security-659", "Win-Security-654", "Win-Security-664","Win-Security-4737","Win-Security-4750", "Win-Security-4755", "Win-Security-4760" )

Report.Name: FISMA AC-2: Local Windows User Accounts Created
Report.Description: This report captures user accounts added on a server

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_26
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType = "Win-Security-624" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-2: Local User Accounts Deleted
Report.Description: This report captures user accounts removed from a server

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_27
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-630", "Win-Security-4726")

Report.Name: FISMA AC-2: Local Windows User Accounts Modified
Report.Description: This report captures local user account modifications.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_28
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-625", "Win-Security-626","Win-Security-642", "Win-Security-627", "Win-Security-628", "Win-Security-629","Win-Security-636","Win-Security-650","Win-Security-637","Win-Security-651","Win-Security-632","Win-Security-633","Win-Security-655","Win-Security-656","Win-Security-660","Win-Security-661","Win-Security-665","Win-Security-666") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-2: Users Added To Local Groups
Report.Description: This report captures users added to local groups.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_32
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-636", "Win-Security-650") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-2: Users Added To Global Groups
Report.Description: This report captures users added to global or univeral groups.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_33
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-632", "Win-Security-655","Win-Security-660", "Win-Security-665")

Report.Name: FISMA AC-2: Local Windows Groups Modified
Report.Description: This report captures local group modifications

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_37
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-639", "Win-Security-649") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-2: Local Windows Groups Created
Report.Description: This report captures local group creations

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_41
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-635", "Win-Security-648") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-2: Global Windows Groups Created
Report.Description: This report captures global group creations

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-631", "Win-Security-653","Win-Security-658", "Win-Security-663") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-2: Global Windows Groups Modified
Report.Description: This report captures global group modifications

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_40
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-641", "Win-Security-654","Win-Security-659", "Win-Security-664") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-2: Global Groups Created
Report.Description: This report captures global group creations

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-631", "Win-Security-653","Win-Security-658", "Win-Security-663","Win-Security-4727", "Win-Security-4749","Win-Security-4754", "Win-Security-4759")

Report.Name: FISMA AC-2: Global Groups Deleted
Report.Description: This report captures global group deletions

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-634", "Win-Security-657","Win-Security-662", "Win-Security-667","Win-Security-4730", "Win-Security-4753","Win-Security-4758", "Win-Security-4763")

Report.Name: FISMA AC-2: Global Groups Modified
Report.Description: This report captures global group modifications

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_40
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-641", "Win-Security-654","Win-Security-659", "Win-Security-664","Win-Security-4737", "Win-Security-4750","Win-Security-4755", "Win-Security-4760")

Report.Name: FISMA AC-2: Local Groups Created
Report.Description: This report captures local group creations

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_41
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-635", "Win-Security-648","Win-Security-4731", "Win-Security-4744")

Report.Name: FISMA AC-3: Audited Linux file changes
Report.Description: Tracks user modifications to Linux files and directories. Both the content and attribute modifications are captured. For actions on directories, the affected files in the directories are also captured.

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_12
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "LINUX_FILE_CHANGE")

Report.Name: FISMA AC-3: Windows Domain Controller Config Changes
Report.Description: Provides detailed windows domain controller config changes

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_20
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_ConfigChange)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-3: Windows Server Config Modification Details
Report.Description: This report captures the details of windows server configuration or policy modification events. Details include the administrative user, file/directory, the operation performed and the raw log

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_12
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_ConfigChange)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-3: Windows File Access Failures
Report.Description: This report captures the details of windows server file access failures. Details include the administrative user, file/directory, the operation performed and the raw log

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_FileChange) AND eventAction = 1

Report.Name: FISMA AC-3: Windows File Access Successes
Report.Description: This report captures the details of windows server file access successes. Details include the administrative user, file/directory, the operation performed and the raw log

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-560","Win-Security-564") AND eventAction = 0

Report.Name: FISMA AC-3: Successful Firewall Admin Logons
Report.Description: Details about successful firewall logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-3: Failed Firewall Admin Logons
Report.Description: Details about failed firewall logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-3: Successful Router Admin Logons
Report.Description: Details about successful router logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_24
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-3: Failed Router Admin Logons
Report.Description: Details about failed router logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-3: Successful VPN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Provides event details for all successful VPN admin logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_VPNGW_13
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VPN_GATEWAY) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogoff) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-3: Failed VPN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Provides event details for all failed VPN admin logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_VPNGW_14
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VPN_GATEWAY) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-3: Successful WLAN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Tracks successful admin logons to the WLAN Controller

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-3: Failed WLAN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Tracks failed admin logons to the WLAN Controller

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-3: Privileged Windows Server Logon Attempts using the Administrator Account
Report.Description: This report details prvileged logon attempts to a windows server using the Administrator account

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_29
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND user = "Administrator" AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-3: Remote Desktop Connections to Windows Servers
Report.Description: This report details successful and failed remote desktop connections

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_30
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND winLogonType = 10 AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-3: Unix Server Privileged Logon
Report.Description: This report details UNIX server privileged logon (su) details with all parsed parameters and raw logs

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_10
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND (eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonSuccess) OR eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-3: Unix Server Privileged Command Execution
Report.Description: This report details privilege command execuations (sudo) at a Unix server

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_9
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND (eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivExecSuccess) OR eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivExecFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-3: Detailed Successful Login At FISMA Device
Report.Description: Captures detailed successful logins at any device or application including servers, network devices, domain controllers, VPN gateways, WLAN controllers and applications

SubPattern.name: Filter_Auth_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainLogonSuccess, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainLogonSuccess, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_VPNLogonSuccess, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WirelessLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AppLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-3: Windows Server Account Lock/Unlock history
Report.Description: Captures account lockouts and unlocks on windows servers. Account lockouts happen on repeated login failures and may be suspicious if they are repeated or happen at odd hours of operation.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_43
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountLocked,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountUnlocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-3: Privileged Domain Controller Logon Attempts using the Administrator Account
Report.Description: Ranks the windows servers and their users by the number of failed logons using the administrator account

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_32
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND user = "Administrator" AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-3: Remote Desktop Connections to Domain Controller
Report.Description: Details successful remote desktop connections

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_33
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND winLogonType = 10 AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)

Report.Name: FISMA AC-3: Successful Database Server Logon Details
Report.Description: Captures successful database server logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_DBServer_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DBLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: FISMA CM-4: Failed Database Server Logon Details
Report.Description: Captures failed database server logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_DBServer_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DBLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_COBIT)

Report.Name: FISMA CM-4: Firewall Configuration Changes
Report.Description: This report captures detected firewall configuration changes

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_RUN_CONFIG","PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_STARTUP_CONFIG") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA CM-4: Router/Switch Configuration Changes
Report.Description: This report captures detected startup or running config changes

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_RUN_CONFIG","PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_STARTUP_CONFIG") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA CM-4: Firewall Run vs Startup Configuration Change
Report.Description: This report captures detected differences between a firewall's running and startup config

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_35
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_DELTA_CONFIG" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA CM-4: Router Run vs Startup Configuration Difference
Report.Description: This report captures detected differences between a routers running and startup config

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_35
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_DELTA_CONFIG" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Top Outbound Permitted Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted outbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_20
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Top Inbound Permitted Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted inbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_21
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Top Permitted High Port Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks the high port services permitted by firewalls - these services may pose security risk

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Top Permitted Uncommon Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks uncommon services permitted by firewalls - common services include DNS, SMTP, Web

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort NOT IN (25,53,80,443,123)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Top Permitted Vulnerable Low Port Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks uncommon services permitted by firewalls - vulnerable services include Microsoft services such as MS-RPC (135), NETBIOS-SSN (139), MICROSOFT-DS (445), MS-SQL (1433,1434), FTP (23), TELNET (21)

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_40
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort IN (135,139,445,1433,1434,23,21) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Top Firewall Originated Or Destined Permitted Connections By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the firewall originated or destined connections - these connections would be typically be for administrative and monitoring purposes

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) OR destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Top Network IPS events By Severity, Count
Report.Description: Ranks the network IPS events by count

SubPattern.name: Filter_NIPS_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Top Network Scanners By Event Count
Report.Description: Ranks the source IP addresses by detected network scan or reconnaissance events

SubPattern.name: Filter_NIPS_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Reconn) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Top Blocked Network Attacks By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the network attacks attacks blocked by network IPS

SubPattern.name: Filter_NIPS_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS) AND eventAction = 1 AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Top Inbound Blacklisted Mail Gateways By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks denied mail gateways by the number of attempted SMTP connections. The most common reason of denial is often the gateway being included in blacklists.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WEB_PROXY_14
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Top Inbound Blacklisted Mail Gateways and SMTP Error Types By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks denied mail gateways and the SMTP errors by the number of attempted connections. The most common SMTP error is often the gateway being included in mail blacklists.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WEB_PROXY_15
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Filtered Inbound Spam Count
Report.Description: Counts total inbound spam denied by spam filtering policy

SubPattern.name: Filter_WEB_PROXY_16
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Top Outbound Blacklisted Mail Gateways By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks denied mail gateways by the number of attempted SMTP connections. The most common reason of denial is often the gateway being included in blacklists.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WEB_PROXY_17
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Top Outbound Blacklisted Mail Gateways and SMTP Error Types By Connections
Report.Description: Ranks denied mail gateways and the SMTP errors by the number of attempted connections. The most common SMTP error is often the gateway being included in mail blacklists.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WEB_PROXY_18
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Filtered Outbound Spam Count
Report.Description: Counts total outbound spam denied by policy

SubPattern.name: Filter_WEB_PROXY_16
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Total Denied Web Connections By Policy
Report.Description: Counts denied web site connections because of policy violations

SubPattern.name: Filter_WEB_PROXY_20
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WebsiteCategoryViolation)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Top Mail Security Gateway Actions By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the actions taken by the mail security gateway - actions include blocking an inbound/outbound mail gateway because of RBL or other SMTP violations, blocking a mail because of spam or other policy violations and delivering a mail

SubPattern.name: Filter_WEB_PROXY_21
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_GwBlocked,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_Remedy_Success,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW,Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_GW)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Top hosts with Malware found by Host Antivirus

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Malware) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Top IPs with Malware Found By IPS and Firewalls
Report.Description: Tracks IP addresses with Malware as found by IPS

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_10
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Malware) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Top IPs with Malware Found By Antivirus and Security Gateways
Report.Description: Tracks IP addresses with Malware as found by Host Anti-virus and Security Gateways

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Malware) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_FISMA)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Virus found and remediated
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate the viruses found and remediated. This report is applicable for host antivirus, security gateways, proxies and firewalls that do content inspection e.g. Palo Alto Firewall, Untangle etc.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Worm_Remedy_Success) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Virus found but not remediated
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate viruses found but failed to remedy - the events could be from Host Anti-virus or Network Security Gateways. This report is applicable for host antivirus, security gateways, proxies and firewalls that do content inspection e.g. Palo Alto Firewall, Untangle etc.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Worm_Remedy_Failed) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Spyware found and remediated
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate spyware was found and remediated on a host. This report is applicable for host antivirus, security gateways, proxies and firewalls that do content inspection e.g. Palo Alto Firewall, Untangle etc.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Spyware_Remedy_Success) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Spyware found but not remediated
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate spyware was found but the detecting software failed to remediated the vulnerability. This report is applicable for host antivirus, security gateways, proxies and firewalls that do content inspection e.g. Palo Alto Firewall, Untangle etc.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Spyware_Remedy_Failed) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Spam/Malicious Mail Attachment found and remediated
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate spam or mailicious mail attachments were found and remediated on a host. This report is applicable for host antivirus, security gateways, proxies and firewalls that do content inspection e.g. Palo Alto Firewall, Untangle, Websense Mail gateway, Ironport Mail Gateway etc.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_Remedy_Success)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Spam/Malicious Mail Attachment found but not remediated
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate spyware was found but the detecting software did not remediated the vulnerability. This report is applicable for host antivirus, security gateways, proxies and firewalls that do content inspection e.g. Palo Alto Firewall, Untangle, Websense Mail gateway, Ironport Mail Gateway etc.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_MailMalware_Found)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Phishing attempt found and remediated
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate phishing attempt

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_7
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Phish_Remedy_Success)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Host vulnerabilities found by scanners
Report.Description: This report details the host vulnerabilties found by scanners like Qyalys, Nessus, nCircle etc

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_13
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Vulnerability)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Top Blocked Inbound Connections By Count
Report.Description: Top Inbound Denied Connections Ranked By Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_28
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: FISMA SI-4: Top Blocked Outbound Connections By Count
Report.Description: Top Blocked Outbound Connections Ranked By Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_30
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DenyTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: FISMA AU-6: All Monitoring System Admin User Logon Attempts
Report.Description: Details all Monitoring System Admin User Logon Attempts

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: phEventCategory = 2 AND eventType IN ("PH_AUDIT_USER_LOGIN_SUCCESS","PH_AUDIT_USER_LOGIN_FAILURE","PH_AUDIT_USER_LOGOFF","PH_AUDIT_USER_SESSION_TIMEOUT")

Report.Name: FISMA IR-4: Top Security Incidents By Severity, Count
Report.Description: Ranks the security related incidents by first their severity and then by their count

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_STATUS
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: phEventCategory = 1 AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PH_RULE_SEC)
